raw_text: ABEYWICKREMA SUMITH – Beloved husband of Irandi (nee Goonewardene),​ father of Yasas,​ Sumedha and Roshini,​ father-in-law of Vishni,​ Vishani and Suranjeeva,​ grandfather of Heshan and Suchita,​ Isuri and Bavantha and Jaliya. Great grandfather of Jayden and Cayden,​ passedaway peacefully on July 17th 2023. A private funeral was held in accordance with his wishes. The family sincerely thank all those who supported them in numerous ways.045962

KADURUWANE – CUDA – At Rest with Jesus. Beloved son of Nanda and Sharmina and precious grandson of Tendry and Princess,​ loving partner of Sue. Cuda’s remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9.00 a.m. Wednesday,​ 26th July. Funeral Service at 4.30 p.m. followed by Cremation at 5.30 p.m. at the New Crematorium Borella Kanatte.045944
